text.headline:
Software Engineer
Mphasis an HP company
text.text:
Project Name: JetAirways
The application is designed for the customers of the Jet Airways India Ltd. This is a Jet Airways Portal accessible by JetPrivilege members, guest users and anonymous users. It provides various functionalities like online booking, Manage Booking, PNR Status, Hotel Booking, Web Check-in, Currency Converter, Time Zone Converter, Time Zone Converter, Forgot Password, Change Password, Mileage Calculator, Jet Wallet (Mobile Ticketing), Flight Status, etc. Involved in code construction, designing, client communication, Unit Testing and deployment.
